text: Gullane Entertainment (originally The Britt Allcroft Company) was a television production company and division by Lyrick Studios in the United Kingdom. They produced programs for children, including Thomas and Friends. ==Programs== * Thomas & Friends (1984-2003, series 1-7) * Magic Adventures of Mumfie (1994-1998) * James the Cat (1998 series) ==References== Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom Category:British television
title: Gullane Entertainment
